mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admins (company_id, name, email, password, phone_number, address, role, created_at, email_verified) VALUES (#{companyId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{emailVerified})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM admins WHERE REPLACE(phone_number, '-', '') = REPLACE(#{phoneNumber}, '-', '')
